project.name: Invoicing App
project.desc: For this project we used ReactJS to create the frontend for an invoice app. In the app you are able to sort, view, create and mark as paid the invoices.

project.name: Music Player App
project.desc: For this project we used PHP in combination with a MySQL database to create the backend for a spotify-like music playing app, where you are able to select an artist, view their albums. Playing or favouriting a song would load a query to update the database.

project.name: Book Swap API
project.desc: For this project we used Laravel in combination with a MySQL database to create the backend for a book swapping app, where you are able to filter and view books, add new books, claim and unclaim books and . All of these features

project.name: Todo App API
project.desc: This was a solo project which I used Laravel to create an API for a Todo App. I experimented with using Blade to make view available in the queryfor testing purposes.

project.name: Portfolio
project.desc: This is the site you're currently viewing. Made using HTML, CSS and JavaScript. Like my other projects it is reactive and can be viewd in mobile or desktop tanks to media query.
